name: Backend Developer
description: Senior Back-End Engineer position at a WealthTech startup, Realist, focusing on building and maintaining back-end systems using Node.js, TypeScript, and NestJS. Responsibilities include developing APIs, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and integrating various technologies. Requires 5+ years of back-end development experience and proficiency in multiple programming languages and tools. Preferred skills include Redis, WSL, and UI libraries.

grades.name: Back-end development experience
grades.description: Requires at least 5 years of back-end development experience.

grades.name: Node.js experience
grades.description: Requires at least 3 years of experience with Node.js.
